Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Oil lamp
Description: Oval-shaped oil lamp that becomes narrower towards the spout. The central part is pierced by a small circular opening encircled by a thick rim. There is a protuberance on one side. The decoration consists of a geometrical motif incised in relief radiating from the center. The base is slightly concave.
